name: Mask Wight
description: The Mask Wight is a Medium undead creature with a high level of durability and a strong presence in combat. It combines intimidating physical prowess with the ability to wield necrotic energy, making it quite dangerous.
memorable: The Mask Wight's ability to erase memories can have significant narrative repercussions, making it a terrifying foe.
goals: To seek out and attack fiends while inflicting fear and confusion upon its enemies.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other undead or fiendish creatures.
environment: Commonly found in dark, cursed, or haunted locations.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage, strong against many conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which can significantly harm it.
attacks: Uses a combination of deadly melee attacks with its Khopesh of Oblivion and Spiked Gauntlet, dealing both slashing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Wail of the Forgotten can obliterate victims from memory across the planes, incapacitating them and erasing any trace of their existence.
equipment: Khopesh of Oblivion and Spiked Gauntlet.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 30 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Has strong saving throws indicating exceptional resilience against many types of attacks.
additional_information: Immune to being charmed, frightened, or paralyzed.
Weapon attacks deal additional necrotic damage.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Advantage on attack rolls against fiendish opponents.
Can forget cherished memories of targets hit by its attacks.
